name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: White Book
name_original: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: White Book
description:
Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: White Book is an adventure-RPG game. It came out on 17-11-2000. It was published by Atlus. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: White Book on Game Boy Color.
